amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Forest Service from using Knutson-Vandenberg funds for indirect support activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of Knutson-Vandenberg funds to be used for indirect support activities.

action.text: On agreeing to the Miller (CA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 182 (Roll No. 320).
